Name: Gauls
History: The Gauls were the Celtic tribes of continental Europe. Dominated by a priestly class of Druids, they featured a sophisticated culture of advanced metalworking, agriculture, trade and even road engineering. With heavy infantry and cavalry, Gallic warriors valiantly resisted Caesar's campaign of conquest and Rome's authoritarian rule.

Technologies.Name: - Late Armies
Technologies.Description: Solduros can be trained at the barracks and Brihent at the Stables.

Technologies.Name: - Great Migration
Technologies.Description: Structures -30% build time, no territory restrictions.

Technologies.Name: - Gallic Wall
Technologies.Description: Walls and Fortresses +3 all armor levels.

Technologies.Name: - Trimarchisia
Technologies.Description: Cavalry units +0.9 hit point regeneration per second.

CivBonuses.Name: - Priests
CivBonuses.Description: +10% hit points for each temple technology researched.

CivBonuses.Name: - Structures
CivBonuses.Description: -20% build time and hit points. Several Structures cost wood instead of stone.
